alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 01 at 9:32PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will improve Thursday morning as winds diminish.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
